tweet.text: PUBLIC PRESENTATION March 7, 2022 at 10:05am EST At the #HAC meeting, attend "A Short History of the #FRUS Series" to learn about evolving editing practices and #declassification processes To register for this free online event, please send an email to FortJL@state.gov https://t.co/tNSrUVolnI
